group_1.textRight: Sakurako, you should come up with a@scary story too.

group_1.textLeft: I'll praise you if you can manage to@scare me!
| Very well. |
| I'll prepare a scary story that you'll@never forget. |

group_1.textRight: What...?!

group_1.textLeft: Going to the beach and telling ghost stories@at night, huh...
So, you wanted to talk to me about...

group_1.textRight: | I would like you to help me find a scary story,@one that they'll never forget. |

group_1.textLeft: Why me?

group_1.textRight: | Because you're my most dependable Senpai. |

group_1.textLeft: Well...um...
I'm flattered that you came to me, but I don't@know much about scary stories.
I could help you look them up online, at least...

group_1.textRight: | I've already searched the Internet. |
| However, I don't find any of the stories@scary... |

group_1.textLeft: So you're looking for...
"A scary story you'll never forget"...

group_1.textRight: | ...That's correct. |

group_1.textLeft: If that's the case, then we go back to@square one.

group_1.textRight: | Square one? |

group_1.textLeft: Once again, we talk to someone who knows@more than us.
So that's why you came to me and Ikumi.

group_1.textRight: I understand Ryo, but why little ol' me?

group_1.textLeft: Don't you ever hear scary stories from@your customers?

group_1.textRight: Ah... I seeee...

group_1.textLeft: | Do you know a scary story that one will@never forget? |

group_1.textRight: Hmm, I know plenty of scary stories.
But "so scary that you'll never forget" is@a tough one...
Sakurako, you looked some up online,@didn't you?
Kyaaa! So scaaary!@[chara:305301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:305301:lipSynch_1][chara:305301:cheek_0][chara:305301:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json]Did you ever think something like that?

group_1.textLeft: | There were many things that I found to be@irrational developments. |

group_1.textRight: ...Sakurako, maybe you don't understand what@makes a ghost story scary?

group_1.textLeft: | ...That's possible. |

group_1.textRight: So we start from there...
Do you want to visit a haunted place?
You might understand how scary they are if you@personally experience it, instead of just listening.

group_1.textLeft: | Indeed, real experience is highly valuable. |

group_1.textRight: Waaah?! A haunted place?!@I'm super scared...!

group_1.textLeft: You seem to be doing just fine, since you're@staying in character.

group_1.textRight: Meanie!
Since you're going there, why don't we find@some scary stories about the ocean?

group_1.textLeft: | The ocean? |

group_1.textRight: You're staying at the beach, so it'll feel more@lifelike, right?

group_1.textLeft: | What do you mean? |

group_1.textRight: It's like when people hear scary stories@about baths...
It'll make them feel scared to take baths,@that sort of thing.

group_1.textLeft: | I see, so there's something like that. |

group_1.textRight: It's settled.
Tomorrow, we'll bring our swimsuits and@meet up at the beach!

group_1.textLeft: ...You're just planning to have fun, aren't you?

group_1.textRight: There's always something happening by@the ocean, it's a treasure trove of stories.
It's summer, so we should swim just@a teensy little bit.

group_1.textLeft: | All right, I'll see you tomorrow at the beach. |
